ctx: intros a HA HLR HRC HCO.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad HA : preDTA_ref_ok d HLR : liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil HRC : forall u : term, term_list_occur u tnil -> forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a u -> reconnaissance_co d a a u HCO : forall b : ad, prec_occur prec_empty b -> coacc d a b Unable to unify "reconnaissance_co ?M1853 ?M1854 ?M1854 ?M1851" with "liste_reconnait_co d prec_empty a tnil".

original: intros d. unfold rec_co_def_4. intros a HA HLR HRC HCO. apply HRC. - intros u HU d' a'. apply HA. - intros b HPO. apply HCO.
